data.name: Masterpiece X
data.description:
Masterpiece X is the 3D platform for EVERY creator!

============
SPECIAL HOLIDAY OFFER
Buy Masterpiece X today - at a special, one-time price - and get lifetime access to the app (+ future updates) and unlock UNLIMITED PRIVATE EXPORTING!
============

We designed Masterpiece X for anyone who:
-> wants to start creating in 3D but isn't sure where to start
-> is frustrated with complex tools.

NEW: Introducing Masterpiece X - Generate - right in VR!
Our generative AI is the first text-to-3D tool to enable the creation of assets with mesh, textures, and animations (for human models only).

With only a few words, generate completely rigged & animated characters, animals and objects - and then remix them - all from right inside your Meta Quest headset!

With Masterpiece X, you can unlock an entirely new way to create 3D assets by:
> generating a complete 3D model: character, animal or object - using text-to-3D
(get 250 bonus credits free, additional credit purchases are available)
> remixing any part of your model - from mesh to texturing, rigging, and animation
> finding free-to-use models in the community library (or import your own)
> exporting your model to your game, virtual world, or creative project, and
> sharing it with our community to inspire & help others!

Masterpiece X is NOT a good fit  for creators who want:
> to start from scratch,
> elaborate control over simplicity, or
> a VR version of existing 3D modeling tools.

Get Masterpiece X and start creating 3D today!

changelog.change_log:
December 15, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all VR pioneers!

This update focuses on small improvements and stability updates!.


Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where a new animation take or deleted one will not get saved to the project until a keyframe has been added to another animation
- Fixed an issue where a user might experience intermittent headlocks if they haven’t used the app for a long time
- Fixed an issue where material properties are different after auto-uv
- Fixed an issue where in certain scenarios moving a bone in rigging mode will also move the mesh
- Fixed an issue with texture paint tool getting an error under specific scenarios
- Fixed an issue in texture paint mode where undo/redo can stop working after many undo/redos
- Fixed texture color picker gizmo being reflected when the mirror tool is active

Performance

- Improved starting load times by a bit
- Reduced application file size

UX Improvements

- Improved noticeability of the Home button
- Allowed Meta Keyboard to be moved in the home scene


Stay tuned for more exciting updates in the future!


Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

December 11, 2023 Developer Update:


Hello all VR pioneers!

We’ve made a few tweaks to the sign in process for Masterpiece X to help guide users in a more streamlined way! We’ve also provided a handful of smaller bug fixes.


Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where after auto-skinning moving the model in certain modes would cause the mesh to move in unexpected ways
- Fixed an issue where decals would share the opacity value with colors
- Fixed an issue where the edges of decals would have pop in effects when not hovered over anything

UX Improvements

- Updated sign in flow to help guide users with sign in process


Stay tuned for more exciting updates in the future!


Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

November 28, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all VR pioneers!

We're thrilled to welcome you to a new era of immersive experiences as we introduce a groundbreaking update to Masterpiece X. In this release, we're unlocking the full potential of generative AI for 3D models, reshaping the way you interact with virtual environments and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in VR development.


Bug Fixes

- Fixed black line artifacts after texture transfer occurring on the Quest Pro
- Fixed mirror appearing off from the origin of the model on a second project
- Fixed issues with skinning undo
- Fixed issues with skinning redo
- Fixed model potentially disappearing after a bone delete operation
- Fixed skinning shader not showing on the second project run
- Fixed skinning improperly rotating the model if bones are jointed
- Fixed grab buttons not being able to extend the bone length in rigging mode
- Fixed animation keyframe setting causing lag and not setting in certain scenarios
- Fixed the version number not showing on the back of the off hand palette
- Fixed undos in animations not working properly in certain scenarios
- Fixed animation undo separating the bone movement and keyframe setting into two different actions
- Fixed saving happening in 2 steps instead of one when logging in during a project session
- Fixed an issue with sign up UI prompt not showing under specific scenarios
- Fixed remesh causing textures to not properly save
- Fixed AutoUV not properly saving new UV maps
- Fixed mirror on texture paint causing paint to overlap


Performance Improvements

- Improved performance when switching between submeshes in texture mode
- Improved performance across the board with Engine and Oculus SDK updates


UX Improvements

- Added new UI for the GenAI flow
- Improved home card flow
- Improved Sign in flow
- Added a prompt before exiting the project


Features

- Creating 3D Generative AI models within Masterpiece X
- Importing Generative AI models within Masterpiece X
- Added Meta Keyboard for typing


Stay tuned for more exciting features in the future!


Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

October 13, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all 3D creators & remixers!

Our biggest update yet is here which allows import of your custom models! 


Bug Fixes

- Fixed decals not stamping onto reflective surfaces correctly
- Fixed onboarding tooltips staying on the controller if you exit early
- Fixed undo/redo not showing on model in texture paint sometimes
- Fixed multiple texture paint bugs 
- Fixed bug in animation mode that would cause it to only perform IK grabs
- Fixed bug where deleting a bone in the middle of the hierarchy would cause bones to be misplaced on project load


UX Improvements

- Modified Shrink/Bulge tool speed
- Improved IK & FK bone posing
- Made beginner & advanced modes persistent across sessions
- Removed back face culling to improve visibility of certain imported files


Features

- Importing custom models
- Remesh
- Auto UV


Stay tuned for more exciting features in the future!


Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

September 19, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all 3D creators & remixers!

This update focuses primarily on bug fixes and stability. 


Bug Fixes

- Fixed not being able to set keyframes when using IK grabbing
- Fixed memory leaks in texture painting mode
- Fixed undoing animation poses causing non-bind poses in other modes

UX Improvements

- Removed cancel button for export
- Added motion smoothing to texture paint tools

Features

- Enabled Auto-Rig on multi-mesh models


Stay tuned for more exciting features in the future!


Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

September 1, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all 3D creators & remixers!

This update focuses primarily on bug fixes and stability. 



Bug Fixes

- Fixed home web browser occasionally being blurry in the build for Quest 2 users

- Fixed a bug with undo/redo on deleted bones improperly affecting skinning

- Improved performance of bone deletion tool

- Fixed undoing moved bones after grabbing and moving the model

- Fixed auto skin not properly showing the skinning weights on the model

- Blocked undo/redo from being performed mid-action which caused unexpected results

- Fixed the laser pointer becoming active while pointing at UI during a tool action or grab action



UX Improvements

- Prompt for handedness at start of program

- Improved placement of the 3 home action cards on launch

- Made the shrink feature less sensitive

- Improved lighting to show less harsh shadows



Features

- Saved handedness



Stay tuned for more exciting features in the future!


Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

August 18, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all 3D creators & remixers!

We’ve heard your feedback and we’re back with another update, this update will provide more useability and stability!


Bug Fixes
Fixed mirror not scaling with the model
Fixed painting at 100% hardness affecting paint location
Fixed rig move tool on a child bone rotating the bone
Fixed undo/redo with bone create breaking past 2 undos
Fixed a bug with bone delete affecting skinning on other bones
Fixed moving grabbing bones and applying undo/redo in rigging mode offsetting the expected bind pose
Fixed tool usage being ignored on the first trigger pull in texture painting
Improved multiple model import bugs
Fixed multiple saving bugs


UX Improvements
Added mesh selection as part of the undo/redo stack
Fixed onboarding UI overlapping dialog box UI
Made onboarding model spawn next to UI
Added option to cancel saves

Features
Joint/Unjoint tool
Left handed mode
Texture sample tool


Our next update will bring more bug fixes and features! Stay tuned!

Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team

July 19, 2023 Developer Update:

Hello all 3D creators & remixers!

We’ve heard your feedback and we’re back with another update - this time adding some more significant updates and key fixes! 


Bug Fixes
- Improvements to Undo/Redo
- Fixed brushes not always targeting correct bounding box
- Fixed a halo around the painted material when texture painting
- Fixed the fill tool not supporting the normal slider
- Fixed the scene graph not populating correctly between multiple 
  project loads
- Improved issue where materials would dump out after maximum 
  memory limit is reached
- Fixed white from the alpha channel on decals showing on top of 
  erased areas in texture painting mode
- Fixed an issue where project would not be loadable if a bone was 
  deleted in the middle of the hierarchy

UX Improvements
- Added version number on the back of off-hand controller UI
- Laser interaction improvements
- Fixed varying UI being obscured by other UI
- Updated wording of many prompts to be more clear
- Improved menu spawning behavior
- Updated styling of UI sliders
- Added a final completion step for onboarding
- Added version number of software on the back of the UI of the 
  offhand controller

Features
- Mirror mode for mesh and texture tools
- Deleting bones on multi-mesh models


Our next update will bring more bug fixes and features! Stay tuned!

Happy Remixing!

Masterpiece X Team
